Hi there!

Thanks, guys for taking my chars for now. I won't be posting as a 
player for some times, but I might do something else.

I don't think I'll act as a player right now, but I stay active in 
the council. This also means the upcoming storylines.

Airly and I have been talking about the storylines and we might start 
them really soon. A feature that would be included is Non-player 
characters (NPC) that would be council-controlled. Also, depending on 
the intensity of the fight, they would be quite killable.

Be on the look-out. These storylines will be there soon (actually, as 
soon as we can agree on them!).

Also, I'm still in the council. Any technical question, I'm there for 
it.

Nic
